Package org.alindner.cish.extension

Interface Extension

All Known Subinterfaces:
Dependencies
All Known Implementing Classes:
CishDependency, JarDependency, LocalJarDependency, MavenDependency
public interface Extension
Basic interface for all extension

Will be used by {@see Interpreter}

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getClasses()  
    java.util.Map<Extension,​Type> getConflicts()
    get a list of extension which conflicts with this extension
    java.util.Map<Extension,​Type> getDependencies()
    get a list of extension which are dependencies for this extension
    java.lang.String getName()
    get full, unique name of extension.
    java.util.List<CishPredicate> getPredicates()
    Get a list of all provided predicates
    java.lang.String getVersion()
    get version of Extension

  • Method Details

    • getVersion

      java.lang.String getVersion()
      get version of Extension

      needs to be semantic version

      Returns:
      version

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      get full, unique name of extension.

      It is recommend to use your full package name.

      Returns:
      name

    • getClasses

      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getClasses()
      Returns:
      get a list of all class which this extension provides

    • getDependencies

      java.util.Map<Extension,​Type> getDependencies()
      get a list of extension which are dependencies for this extension
      Returns:
      list of dependencies

    • getConflicts

      java.util.Map<Extension,​Type> getConflicts()
      get a list of extension which conflicts with this extension
      Returns:
      list of conflicting extensions

    • getPredicates

      java.util.List<CishPredicate> getPredicates()
      Get a list of all provided predicates
      Returns:
      predicates
